titleStmt.title: P.GrohmannAperçu p. 50 (= P.World p. 116 = CPR XXI 02 b)

availability.p: © The Arabic Papyrology Database. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License.

div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيــم
هذا كتاب من جنادة بن المصعب عامل الأمير عمر
بن مهران أصلحه اللّه على خراج كورة الفيّوم لثبــيت مولــى عبد اللّه بن على

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
hāḏā kitāb:un min ǧunādaẗa bni ăl muṣʿabi ʿāmili ăl ʾamīri ʿumara
bni mihrāna ʾaṣlaḥa hu ăl lāhu ʿalà ḫarāǧi kūraẗi ăl fayyūmi li ṯubayt:in mawlà ʿabdi ăl lāhi bni ʿaliyy:in

[Au nom de Dieu, le Miséricordieux, le Compatiss]ant. [In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merci]ful! In the name of God the merciful the compassionat]e
[Ceci est le document de] Ǧounâda ibn al-Mouṣʿab, directeur des finances de l'émir ʿOmar This is a writing from] Junādah ibn al-Muṣʿab, executive of the amir ʿUmar [This is the document from] Gunâda ibn al-Muṣʿab, finance director of the Amîr ʿUmar
ibn Mihrān, may God keep him in good health, over the kharāj of the district of the Fayyū]m for Thubayt, client of ʿAbdallāh ibn ʿAlī [ibn Mihrân, may God preserve him in health, in charge of the tax[es] in the Fayyûm district, for Thuba[it], free[dm]an of ʿAbdallâh ibn ʿAlî. [ibn Mihrân - que Dieu le maintienne en bonne santé - sur les impôts du district d'el-Fayyoû]m, pour Ṯoub[ait] l'affranchi de ʿAbdallâh ibn ʿAlî .....
